title: Leading cause of ransomware infection 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage of respondents for 6 number of Cause of ransomware infections.

The maximum Percentage of respondents 67.0 is found at Cause of ransomware infection Spam/phishing emails and the minimum is found at Malicious websites/web ads where Cause of ransomware infection is 16.0.
The maximum Cause of ransomware infection Spam/phishing emails has got 4.19 times higher Percentage of respondents than the minimum Cause of ransomware infection Malicious websites/web ads.
min_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Cause of ransomware infection, and Percentage of respondents in each Cause of ransomware infection on the y axis.

The maximum Percentage of respondents 67.0 is found at Cause of ransomware infection Spam/phishing emails and the minimum is found at Malicious websites/web ads where Cause of ransomware infection is 16.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage of respondents for 6 number of Cause of ransomware infections.

The maximum Percentage of respondents 67.0 is found at Cause of ransomware infection Spam/phishing emails and the minimum is found at Malicious websites/web ads where Cause of ransomware infection is 16.0.
The maximum Cause of ransomware infection Spam/phishing emails has got 4.19 times higher Percentage of respondents than the minimum Cause of ransomware infection Malicious websites/web ads.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Cause of ransomware infection in the x axis and Percentage of respondents in the y axis.

The maximum Percentage of respondents 67.0 is found at Cause of ransomware infection Spam/phishing emails and the minimum is found at Malicious websites/web ads where Cause of ransomware infection is 16.0.
Cause of ransomware infection Lack of cyber security training has the second highest value for Percentage of respondents.
There is a difference of 51.0 between the maximum Cause of ransomware infection Spam/phishing emails and minimum Cause of ransomware infection Malicious websites/web ads.

Percentage of respondents at Cause of ransomware infection Spam/phishing emails is 67.0 , second place is Lack of cyber security training at 36.0, and thirdly is Weak passwords/access management at 30.0.
Cause of ransomware infection Malicious websites/web ads, and Report clickbait have the same Percentage of respondents.
The Cause of ransomware infection Spam/phishing emails tends to be 2.12 percent higher than average.
The Percentage of respondents is 190.0 if we add up values of all Cause of ransomware infections.
